se.miun.itm.input.tuning.sequential

Class SPOT

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.miun.itm.input.tuning.Tuner
      • se.miun.itm.input.tuning.sequential.SequentialTuner
        • se.miun.itm.input.tuning.sequential.SPOT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITuner, ISequentialTuner

    public class SPOT
extends SequentialTuner
    The implementation of SPOT for InPUT in Java. This interface simplifies experimentation from within Java. It allows for direct use of all statistical support in R, especially, the use of the sequential optimization and retrieval of improved designs with statistical backup. TODO in a future version, the configuration of SPOT should be externalized for InPUT. That way, all features can simply be set using InPUT design files.
    Author:
    Felix Dobslaw
